id.description: The unique identifier of the channel

createdDateTime.description: The date and time when the channel was created

displayName.description: The display name of the channel

email.description: The email address associated with the channel

isFavoriteByDefault.description: Flag indicating if the channel is marked as a favorite by default

membershipType.description: The type of membership in the channel (e.g., public, private)

tenantId.description: The ID of the tenant to which the channel belongs

webUrl.description: The URL for accessing the channel via the web
